page.title: 07Religion in Trefriw l
page.content: This is still an important factor in village life, especially amongst the older members of the community.There are two churches and two chapels in Trefriw. Chapels. Ebenezer Chapel, built in l88l, is Congregational and holds weekly services,with an average attendance of l5 to 2O people, whilst about l2 children attend Sunday School. It is a handsome building with stained glass windows. Peniel Chapel, built in l9lO,is Presbyterian and has an average attendance of 2O, with about 2O children attending Sunday School.It also is a handsome building and can accommodate up to 5OO people. The minister, Rev. R.O.Roberts has three other chapels in his care in nearby villages.
